    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    OptionsEditorDialog
    AbstractWizardActionUI.getEditor(ScenarioTreeEvent evt)
    Creates and returns an OptionsEditorDialog whose content is the steps from AbstractWizardActionUI.getPath() whose model is from AbstractWizardActionUI.getWizardModel(SimplePath, repast.simphony.scenario.Scenario, Object, ScenarioTreeEvent), and whose title is this wizard's title.
    JPopupMenu
